p: 3.5 Î¼g/mL purified recombinant HA protein from A/Texas/36/1991 (HA H1/91) and A/California/4/2009 (HA H1/09, both purchased from Sino Biological Inc.) were coated respectively to the plates following the above ELISA protocol. Positive and negative control sera were used on all plates for normalization between plates.
